title: Postal/courier worker verification (suspicious packages)
dataVerified: Worker name, photo, employee ID, postal service, delivery route
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Shows the issuer domain and the responder text (e.g., "Valid ID" or "Denied").
rationale: Recipient verifies postal worker or courier credentials for unexpected/suspicious packages. Domain binding verifies postal service (usps.gov, royalmail.com) or courier company (ups.com, fedex.com, dhl.com). Prevents fake postal worker scams, package theft. Critical for vulnerable populations who may be targeted with fraudulent deliveries or extortion attempts.
